about_the_game:
A young woman called Lyu Xuan wakes up one night with her chest covered in blood and a mysterious black hole in the palm of her hand. She’s got absolutely no clue as to what’s going on – and to make things even more strange, riches start pouring from her hand. From then on, many monsters will come to her, hoping to control that source of wealth…



Explore a strange world that breaks all conventions; meet with humans and non-humans, and try to befriend them and help them with their plights so they can in turn help you out and uncover the truth of your new powers. The island city of Stage is modern and prosperous, but gloomy and rainy – and it hides countless secrets under its gray mantle. You’ll have to explore Stage, including those supernatural areas hidden behind the veil of reason, to find the truth to what’s going on with you.

Visit strange stores and use the riches that poured from your hand to buy bizarre items, trading back all the strange objects what you find during your journey. But keep track of how much you spend – the final destiny of your adventure will depend of it.



In your adventure, you will find many creatures interested in your wealth. Some will try to talk to you, others will be openly hostile. One of them will follow you like a loyal dog – dressed in white, with long black hair and a delicate shape, but with a huge mouth on the top of its head. Behind its meek behavior, there seems to be a fountain of rage capable of tearing apart anything that threatens you. Who’s this creature that seems to be so attached to you?

KEY FEATURES

  • Uncover the truth and advance in the story by exploring the city. You decide where to go next
  • Keep track of your objective using Luxuan’s smartphone and check information about the mysterious characters and monsters of Stage
  • Your level of wealth will affect the outcome of the game, so keep an eye on your finances

short_description: One night, Lyu Xuan woke up soaked in blood, a mysterious black hole in the palm of her hand, and millions pouring out of that hole, like an unstoppable fountain of wealth. Still in shock, She has to evade the monsters that rushed to her and her new riches. A strange story begins in a gloomy city…
